con:interface.name: Swagger API Definition - Vehicle Domain - v1
con:interface.con:description: Provides API Services for the integration of Vehicle Endpoints (v1) Home

con:part.con:content: swagger: '2.0' info: version: v1 title: Swagger API Definition - Vehicle Domain - v1 description: | Provides API Services for the integration of Vehicle Endpoints (v1) Home host: oemil.volkswagen.de basePath: /services schemes: - https produces: - application/json - application/problem+json parameters: oemil-client-app: name: oemil-client-app in: header description: > Predefined indicator for the application that is calling the OEM.IL. Needs to correspond to an entry in the OEM.IL internal list of valid client applications. Please ask OEM.IL Support for oemil-client-app - single application: \ - platform application: \_\ The security gateway will extract the client-application from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a application value in the token and this http header, then the http header will override the token's application value, i.e. an existing "oemil-client-app" header will always be looped through to the API implementation. examples - VWConnect, CoVa, WCDP_ORU, WCDP_PDM required: true type: string x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-trace-id: name: oemil-trace-id in: header description: > Client generated UUID string which has been uniquely created for that request. Can be used for problem analysis in case of errors. required: true type: string maxLength: 255 x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-client-brand: name: oemil-client-brand in: header description: > The brand value of the OEM manufacturer to which the OEM.IL client belongs to. Expected to be a valid value as specified in the code list CL00441. If the client's brand is already part of the security token, that he brings, then this header is allowed to be omitted from the request. The security gateway will extract the brand from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a brand value in the token and this http header, the token's brand value will override the http header. #Brand derived from code list - CL00441 Brand (all brands inside and outside VW Group). Brand could be a part of the security token. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string x-code-list: CL00441 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.3 x-parameter-model: true oemil-client-country: name: oemil-client-country in: header description: > The country where the OEM.IL client is located. Expected as alpha-2 code of ISO3166-1. If the client's country is already part of the security token, that he brings, then this header is allowed to be omitted from the request. The security gateway will extract the country from the token and add this header to the request by using that value. If both is present, a country value in the token and this http header, the token's country value will override the http header. type: string required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true oemil-lee-country: name: oemil-lee-country in: header description: > Country in which the legal entity (LEE) is located according to ISO 3166, ALPHA-2-code, e.g. "CN" for China. If a CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute is mandatory. If no CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute will be ignored. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true oemil-lee-name: name: oemil-lee-name in: header description: > Code of the legal entity (LEE), e.g. Volkswagen Group has the legal entity code "000100". This means that in this example, the value of the attribute "oemil-lee-name" needs to be set to "000100". For example, all WCDP clients in Europe need to transmit this legal entity code. If a CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute is mandatory. If no CloudIdP token is used, then this attribute will be ignored. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true oemil-api-version: name: oemil-api-version in: header description: > This header parameter describes the version of the OEM.IL API. The endpoint paths do not contain the service version at all. The parameter substitutes the versioning path parameter. The host and base path of the endpoints do not change and the sourcing will be managed by the "oemil-api-version" header. Please note that this header only references to the OEM.IL release version. type: string required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true accept-language: name: accept-language in: header description: > Multi-part string identifier for a language according to IETF RFC4646 (e.g. de, de-DE, de-Latn-DE, de-Latn-DE-1996). The OEM.IL falls back to its own default language when the requested language is unavailable. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true fallback-language: name: fallback-language in: header description: >- Multi-part string identifier as a fallback language according to RFC4646 (e.g. de-DE), which is applied if the accept-language is empty. type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true Authorization: name: Authorization in: header description: Bearer Authorization Token type: string maxLength: 1024 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true Range: name: Range in: header description: > The Range HTTP request header indicates the part of a document that OEM.IL should return. Example1: bytes=1024- (requesting the document starting from byte 1024) Example2: bytes=0-1023 (requesting first 1024 bytes of the document) Example3: bytes=-1024 (requesting the last 1024 bytes of the document) type: string required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true x-oem-source: name: x-oem-source in: header description: > This header parameter describes the connected data source system. If "oem" is used, then the data source system is the actual oem system, e.g. Version42 or Service42. If "mock" is used, then the data source system is OEM.IL based on a service virtualization solution of the corresponding service. The default value for this parameter is "oem". type: string default: oem enum: - oem - mock required: false x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true vin: name: vin in: path description: Unique vehicle identification number of the OEM type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true pdx_filename: name: pdx_filename in: path description: pdx_filename includes pdx_version and pdx_options type: string maxLength: 255 required: true x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true download_id: name: download_id in: path description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) according to RFC 4122 to download object. type: string format: uuid required: true x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true processing_id: name: processing_id in: path description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation according to RFC4122. type: string format: uuid required: true x-parameter-version: 1 x-parameter-model: true vins: name: vins in: query description: >- A list of unique vehicle identification number of the OEM. 50 VINs can be transmitted at maximum. type: array items: type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 required: true maxItems: 50 collectionFormat: csv x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true limit: name: limit in: query description: >- The number of elements per page that are to be retrieved – the default value is 20 and maximum value is 50. type: integer format: int32 default: 20 minimum: 1 maximum: 50 required: false x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true offset: name: offset in: query description: >- The index of page that is to be retrieved – the parameter is zero-indexed and its default value is 0. type: integer format: int16 default: 0 minimum: 0 required: false collectionFormat: csv x-parameter-version: 1.2 x-parameter-model: true securityDefinitions: bearer: name: Authorization description: >- The Bearer authentication scheme was originally created as part of OAuth 2.0 in RFC 6750. type: apiKey in: header responses: '400': description: > Bad Request - The 400 (Bad Request) status code indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing). schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '401': description: > The 401 (Unauthorized) status code indicates that the request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '403': description: > Forbidden - The 403 (Forbidden) status code indicates that the server understood the request but refuses to authorize it. The server that wishes to make public why the request has been forbidden will describe that reason in the response payload. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '404': description: > Not Found - The 404 (Not Found) status code indicates that the origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists. A 404 status code does not indicate whether this lack of representation is temporary or permanent. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '408': description: > The 408 (Request Timeout) status code indicates that the server did not receive a complete request message within the time that it was prepared to wait. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '410': description: > Gone - The 410 (Gone) status code indicates that access to the target resource is no longer available at the origin server and that this condition is likely to be permanent. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '422': description: > Unprocessable Entity - The 422 (Unprocessable Entity) status code indicates that the resource understands the content type of the request entity, and the syntax of the request entity is correct, but it was unable to process the contained instructions. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '429': description: > Too Many Requests - The 429 (Too Many Requests) status code indicates that the resource has been exhausted, perhaps a per-user quota, or perhaps the entire file system is out of space. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '501': description: > The 501 (Not Implemented) status code indicates that the server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' '503': description: "The 503 (Service Unavailable) status code indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overload or scheduled maintenance, which will likely be alleviated after some\_delay.\n" schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' default: description: > Internal server error - The 500 (Internal Server Error) status code indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_2' paths: /vehicles/{vin}/affiliation: get: description: >- Returns the current (latest known) vehicle affiliation according to a private or fleet context. tags: - One of the following three identification keys is transmitted: - Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) -17 characters - Integrierte Fahrzeug Auftragssteuerung Number (IFA Number) - 13 characters - Concatenated combination of BID, commission number, commission year - 14 characters. Hereby the following rules should be considered: * No separators should be used between the concatenated elements. * Remove leading spaces for each element. * Right pad each element with spaces to its maximum length before concatenating the elements all together to the combinated identification key. * The folliwng maximum lengths should be considered: BID - 3 characters, commission number - 7 characters, commission year - 4 characters * e.g.'BI Comm Yr ' * Consider URI encoding accoding to RFC3986, e.g. '%20' should be used for spaces. type: string required: true responses: '200': description: The component-check has been triggered succesfully. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/lifecycle_vehicle_ov1' '400': $ref: '#/responses/400' '401': $ref: '#/responses/401' '403': $ref: '#/responses/403' '408': $ref: '#/responses/408' '429': $ref: '#/responses/429' '500': $ref: '#/responses/default' '501': $ref: '#/responses/501' '503': $ref: '#/responses/503' x-unitTests: [] x-operation-settings: CollectParameters: false AllowDynamicQueryParameters: false AllowDynamicFormParameters: false IsMultiContentStreaming: false x-auth-type: Application & Application User x-throttling-tier: Unlimited x-endpoint-version: 1 x-endpoint-logic: true /vehicles/{vin}/cdis/components: get: description: > Returns Car on Demand Innovation Solution (CDIS) box component data related to a VIN. $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-app' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-trace-id' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-brand' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-client-country' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-lee-country' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-lee-name' - $ref: '#/parameters/oemil-api-version' - $ref: '#/parameters/accept-language' - $ref: '#/parameters/Authorization' - $ref: '#/parameters/processing_id' responses: '200': description: >- The vehicle manifest and configuration manifest data have been returned successfully. schema: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicle_manifest_and_configuration_manifest_data_ov1' '400': $ref: '#/responses/400' '401': $ref: '#/responses/401' '403': $ref: '#/responses/403' '404': $ref: '#/responses/404' '500': $ref: '#/responses/default' '503': $ref: '#/responses/503' x-unitTests: [] x-operation-settings: CollectParameters: false AllowDynamicQueryParameters: false AllowDynamicFormParameters: false IsMultiContentStreaming: false x-auth-type: Application & Application User x-throttling-tier: Unlimited x-endpoint-version: 1 x-endpoint-logic: true definitions: data_integrity_ov1_1: title: data_integrity description: >- Contains information about signature, hash, or something else which is necessary to help in case of data integrity of the file. type: object properties: data_integrity_type: description: Type of data integrity. type: string example: RSA3072 data_integrity_value: description: Value of data integrity. type: string maxLength: 1024 example: AAAA1234EDC345FFFFDDDDDEEEEE4323456 required: - data_integrity_value x-object-version: 1.1 x-object-model: true processing_id_ov1_1: title: processing_id description: Contains a processing information, which can be used for status request type: object properties: processing_id: title: processing_id description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation according to RFC4122. type: string format: uuid example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000 x-object-version: 1.1 x-object-model: true required: - processing_id x-object-version: 1.1 x-object-model: true affiliation_ov1_3: title: affiliation description: The affiliation contains the last known vehicle context. type: object properties: context: description: >- The context of the vehicle contains the allocation in private or fleet. If the vehicle is not allocated the context will be unknown [PRIVATE, FLEET, UNKNOWN]. type: string enum: - PRIVATE - FLEET - UNKNOWN recorded_at: description: >- Timestamp of the recorded status. This timestamp is represented as number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT type: integer format: int64 minimum: 1 example: 1323644400000 required: - context x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true component_ov1_3: title: component description: Technical properties of the vehicle. type: object properties: component_id: description: >- Manufacturer dependent identification number of the component. The 'schemeID' attribute states the manufacturer who issued the numbers. If not stated VWGroup is assumed. type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 example: AA1 diagnostic_address: description: >- For mechanical parts, this can be B (barcode) or S (system interface). For electronic control units this is a hex code of the address ('Baud-address') or the slave id (3 digits) or a 4 digit pseudo address if the ecu is not in Version42. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 1 description: description: Description of the component. type: string maxLength: 50 example: Motorelektronik 1 TNr type_id: description: >- This ID is indicating the type of the component. 01 for example is an engine control unit component. The source for this data is BG-online. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 11 component_data: description: Compressed data set defining the properties of the component. type: string maxLength: 30 example: 06J906027HD no_access_ind: description: >- Indicates whether access to the component data is denied (state 'true') or the component data is accessible (state 'false' or the field is omitted). If true the component data may be omitted or be empty. type: boolean example: false x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: false components_ov1_3: title: components description: >- Technical components - This element defines an alternate view to the Vehicle. type: object properties: vehicles_components: description: For each vehicle (identifier "vin") the components are defined. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicles_components_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true dealer_id_ov1_3: title: dealer_id description: > - unique identification of business partner in applications (e.g. DEUV74623) - only the combination of country, brand and partner number identifies a dealer uniquely type: object properties: country: description: > - Country - The country the dealer works in. Using ISO3166-1-3alpha codes (CL ISO3166-1-3alpha) type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 example: DEU brand: description: > Brand of the dealer (CL00003 BrandCode Describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 1 example: V x-code-list: >- CL00003 BrandCode Describes a brand within the Volkswagen Group. Abbreviation is used because the codes are common within the group. partner_number: description: > - Partner number - The partner number is a 5-digit alphanumeric string (e. g. AB623) given by the importer and only valid in the context of a brand and country. The partner number is stored in the group dealer partner system KVPS as partner nummer type: string minLength: 5 maxLength: 5 example: AB623 required: - country - brand - partner_number x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true dealer_ref_ov1_3: title: dealer_ref description: > - unique identification of business partner in applications e.g. dealer - only the combination of country, brand and partner number identifies a dealer uniquely - the dealer ref contains also the whole saler number as well as role of the dealer type: object properties: dealer_id: $ref: '#/definitions/dealer_id_ov1_3' whole_saler_number: description: >- The wholesaler number identifies a wholesaler. The WholesalerNumber is stored in the Group Importer System KVPS as BID. type: string maxLength: 3 example: V23 role: description: > Role of the dealer (e.g. 'Purchase', 'Delivery', 'Service', 'Agent'). CodeList - CL00007 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 255 example: Agent x-code-list: CL00007 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true equipment_option_ov1_3: title: equipment_option description: Full description of the equipment term. type: object properties: option_code: type: string maxLength: 255 description: > Code of the equipment, like PR Number (CL00364), Package Number, Maneck Code. The code is usually manufacturer dependent. Can be used for technical equipment (CL00324), interior equipmen(CL00322) and exterior equipment (CL00323). CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls example: B0A x-code-list: > - CL00364 PRNumber of a single equipment or an equipment family - CL00324 TechnicalEquipment Volkswagen Group internal reference code to assign the technical equipment based on the Maneck list. - CL00322 InteriorEquipment Volkswagen Group internal reference code to assign the interior equipment based on the Maneck list. - CL00323 ExteriorEquipment Volkswagen Group internal reference code to assign the exterior equipment based on the Maneck list. family: description: Label to group options type: string maxLength: 255 example: BLB equipment_class: type: string maxLength: 255 description: > Equipment class. - CL00045 - Allowed values are - B - regular equipment, relating to the base model - L - country or model specific equipment list - E - extra equipment - G - equipment packages/groups - P - equipment, which belongs to a packet - I - internal equipment (like engine or transmission) - O - other, not catalogued equipment, (with respect to the manufactures selling catalogue) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls example: L x-code-list: CL00045 EquipmentClass description: description: Text description of the equipment term. type: string maxLength: 255 example: Bauteilesatz ohne länderspezifische Bauvorschrift description_type: description: Type of description according to CL00193. type: string example: Marketing x-code-list: CL00193 Equipment Description Type x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true error_code_ov1_2: title: error_code description: Definition of the response error type: object properties: type: description: >- Identifies the problem type (e.g. URI) - additional information of the http error type: string example: https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/index.html title: description: Short message that describes the error type: string maxLength: 255 status: description: Http status codes of the error type: number format: int16 minimum: 100 maximum: 600 detail: description: Specific explanation of the occurred problem. type: string maxLength: 255 oem_error_code: description: >- Code of the fault. It is the technical identifier for a type of faults. type: string maxLength: 4 oem_error_description: type: string description: Written description of the fault. maxLength: 4096 required: - type - title - status - detail x-object-version: 1.2 x-object-model: true error_code_ov1_3: title: error_code description: Definition of the response error type: object properties: type: description: >- Identifies the problem type (e.g. URI) - additional information of the http error type: string example: https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/index.html title: description: Short message that describes the error type: string maxLength: 255 status: description: Http status codes of the error type: integer minimum: 100 maximum: 600 detail: description: Specific explanation of the occurred problem. type: string maxLength: 255 oem_error_code: description: >- Code of the fault. It is the technical identifier for a type of faults. type: string maxLength: 4 oem_error_description: type: string description: Written description of the fault. maxLength: 4096 required: - type - title - status - detail x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true ident_error_ov1_3: title: ident_error description: The incorrect unique identifier with reference to the error code type: object properties: parameter: description: The requested parameter of the object type: string parameter_value: description: The incorrect values according to the parameter type: array items: type: string error: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_3' required: - parameter - parameter_value - error x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true life_data_ov1_3: title: life_data description: Information concerning the life of the vehicle. type: object properties: status: description: > Vehicle status, regarding the whole lifetime (e.g. 'Built', 'Scheduled', 'Shipped', 'InTransit', 'Sold' 'KnockDown', 'Registered', 'Restricted', 'Recycled', 'Repair', 'Update') - CL00010 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: Built x-code-list: CL00010 time_line: $ref: '#/definitions/time_line_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true model_ov1_3: title: model description: Technical properties of the vehicle type: object properties: model_name: description: >- Model name. Description as any text (e.g. Golf V6 4Motion). The 'languageID' attribute states the language used according to RFC4646 (e.g. de, de-DE, de-Latn-DE, de-Latn-DE-1996). type: string maxLength: 255 example: Golf V6 4Motion model_codes: description: > Model codes. Possible values are limited by the following definitions. - CL00027 (MBV) - selling code of the VW Group (e.g. 1J1RZ7 according to the MBV system) - CL00236 (ATLAS) - european type-approval number (e.g. e1*2001/116*0160*21) - CL00310 (Maneck) - Volkswagen Group internal reference code to model assignment based on the Maneck list - CL00442 (KUBA) - Coding for the Vehicle Model Type defined in KUBA - CL00356 (KBA) - model key (TSN) defined by German Federal Motor Vehicle Authority (Kraftfahrtbundesamt), which is only unique with the manufacturer key defined by KBA, DAT - vehicle main type according to the DAT organisation - CL01102 (MBT) - selling code of the VW Group according to the MBT system - CL01343 - Contains the Vehicle Model Code for Porsche CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: type: string example: 1J1RZ7 x-code-list: CL00027, CL00236, CL00310, CL00442, CL00356, CL01102, CL01343 model_year: description: Model year, year of the edition (e.g. 2007). type: integer example: 2007 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true paging_pdx_filenames_ov1_3: title: paging_pdx_filenames description: >- Data object that contains a list of pdx file information for a selected brand. type: object properties: pdx_files: $ref: '#/definitions/pdx_files_ov1_3' offset: description: >- The offset (start pointer) of the items returned (as set in the query or by default). type: integer format: int16 example: 0 limit: description: >- The maximum number of items in the response (as set in the query or by default). type: integer format: int32 example: 20 total: description: The total number of items available to be returned. type: integer format: int32 example: 1238 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true pdx_car_platform_ov1_3: title: pdx_car_platform description: Information about pdx-versions for selected car_platform and pdx-levels. type: object properties: car_platform: description: | description or name of the car_platform in example AU21X type: string maxLength: 5 example: AU21X pdx_levels: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/pdx_level_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true pdx_filename_ov1_3: title: pdx_filename description: Information about pdx-versions and pdx_options based on pdx_filename. type: object properties: pdx_filename: description: | pdx_filename includes pdx_version and pdx_options type: string maxLength: 255 example: AU37X_2017-07-22_2-329_P_r.pdx x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true pdx_files_ov1_3: title: pdx_files description: >- Information about pdx-versions for selected brand (car_platforms) and pdx-levels. type: object properties: pdx_car_platforms: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/pdx_car_platform_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true pdx_level_ov1_3: title: pdx_level description: Information about pdx-versions for selected pdx-level. type: object properties: pdx_level: description: | description or name of the pdx-level in example PDX Level 1 ISO type: string maxLength: 255 example: 68 pdx_filenames: title: pdx_filenames description: >- Information about multiple pdx-versions and pdx_options based on pdx_filename. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/pdx_filename_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true telematic_device_ov1_3: title: telematic_device description: > Object that describe the equipped telematic device, which is interpreted from component information. (e.g. "OCU" is used by Volkswagen and is called Online Connectivity Unit, "cGW" is used by Audi and is called connected Gateway.) type: object properties: value: description: >- Telematic device value describes the interpreted component value [NOT_EQUIPPED_WITH, OCU1, OCU2, OCU3, cGW]. type: string x-extensible-enum: - NOT_EQUIPPED_WITH - OCU1 - OCU2 - OCU3 - cGW example: OCU3 sw_version: description: >- Software version describes the version of the software that is used for the telematic device. type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 4 example: 1 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true time_line_ov1_3: title: time_line description: >- Remarkable dates of the vehicle. Most of them are related to an associated process or order, they may be saved here for further purpose. type: object properties: delivery_date: description: Date of fist delivery according to ISO8601 (e.g. 2007-12-10). type: string format: date-time example: '2007-12-10T00:00:00.000Z' production_date: description: Date of production according to ISO8601 (e.g. 2007-12-10). type: string format: date-time example: '2007-12-10T00:00:00.000Z' production_plant_name: description: Name of the production plant. type: string maxLength: 255 example: Wolfsburg production_plant_id: description: >- Identifier of the production plant. VW-Group identifier is assumed. If another identification schema is used, it must be stated using the 'schemeID' attribute. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 70 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true vehicle_affiliation_ov1_3: title: vehicle_affiliation description: The affiliation contains the last known context for multiple vehicles. type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true affiliation: $ref: '#/definitions/affiliation_ov1_3' required: - vin - affiliation x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true vehicle_ident_ov1_2: title: vehicle_ident description: >- The vehicle identifier define the group-wide platform and project definition of the vehicle. type: object properties: derivate: description: The derivate of the vehicle. type: string maxLength: 2 example: DR generation: description: Generation of the vehicle type: string maxLength: 4 example: AU57 project: description: Offical vehicle project definition. type: string maxLength: 6 example: AU572 x-object-version: 1.2 x-object-model: true vehicles_affiliation_ov1_3: title: vehicles_affiliation description: Data object that contains information about multiple vehicle affiliation type: object properties: vehicles_affiliation: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicle_affiliation_ov1_3' minItems: 1 maxItems: 10000 required: - vehicles_affiliation x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true vehicles_components_ov1_3: title: vehicles_components description: For each vehicle (identifier "vin") the components are defined. type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true components: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/component_ov1_3' x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true error_code_ov1_4: title: error_code description: Definition of the response error. type: object properties: type: description: >- Identifies the problem type (e.g. URI) - additional information of the http error. type: string example: https://oemil.volkswagen.de/apidoc/statuscodes/index.html title: description: Short message that describes the error. type: string maxLength: 255 example: BAD_REQUEST status: description: Http status codes of the error. type: integer minimum: 100 maximum: 600 example: 400 detail: description: Specific explanation of the occurred problem. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 7102 - All VINs invalid (e.g. maxLength) oem_error_code: description: >- Code of the fault. It is the technical identifier for a type of faults. type: string maxLength: 4 oem_error_description: type: string description: Written description of the fault. maxLength: 4096 x-object-version: 1.4 x-object-model: true ident_error_ov1_4: title: ident_error description: The incorrect unique identifier with reference to the error code. type: object properties: parameter: description: Requested parameter of the object. type: string parameter_value: description: Incorrect values according to the parameter. type: array items: type: string error: $ref: '#/definitions/error_code_ov1_4' x-object-version: 1.4 x-object-model: true picture_ov1_4: title: picture description: >- Multiple vehicle information according to the vehicle identification number (vin) type: object properties: url: description: Hashed link to the media resource type: string maxLength: 4096 example: https://www.volkswagen-media-services.com/en/picture/example?width=500 view: $ref: '#/definitions/view_ov1_4' x-object-version: 1.4 x-object-model: true pictures_ov1_4: title: pictures description: Multiple vehicle pictures accroding to the vehicle identification number. type: object properties: pictures: description: Multiple vehicle pictures type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/picture_ov1_4' x-object-version: 1.4 x-object-model: true view_ov1_4: title: view description: >- Defines the content of the media or picture based on object, angle and scenery the picture was rendered, ie. open roof at daylight; if this element is missing, then a list of all possible URLs is returned type: object properties: object: description: > Defines the part of the car (interior or exterior) that the picture has to show. - CL01457 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 255 example: side x-code-list: CL01457 alignment: description: > Defines the alignment of the object, ie. left side or center front. - CL01461 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 255 example: center x-code-list: CL01461 interior_indicator: description: > The view focus on the exterior of the car. If the interior is focused, then the interior_indicator must be set to "true" type: boolean example: true steering_wheel_position: description: > The position of the steering wheel. Normally it is left or right hand drive. - CL01471 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: LHD x-code-list: CL01471 x-object-version: 1.4 x-object-model: true filter_ov1_5: title: filter description: Filter is based on the level and multiple filter criteria type: object properties: filter_level: description: >- In case of searching in clustered object add the search attribute as part of the “key” attribute separated by dot in the following pattern - <.>, for example “components.description” or “engines.engine_code”. type: string example: vin filter_criterias: description: Multiple filter criteria are linked with logical "AND" operator type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/filter_criteria_ov1_5' required: - filter_criterias x-object-version: 1.5 x-object-model: true filter_criteria_ov1_5: title: filter_criteria description: > Filter criteria according to a object search. In case of searching in clustered object add the search attribute as part of the “key” attribute separated by dot in the following pattern - <.>, for example “components.description” or “engines.engine_code”. type: object properties: key: description: Key of search criteria. e.g. one object definition of vehicle type: string example: vin operator: description: A set of operators type: string enum: - EQUAL - CONTAINS - NOT_EQUAL - LOWER_THAN - HIGHER_THAN - LOWER_EQUAL_THAN - HIGHER_EQUAL_THAN - REGEX value: description: >- According to the key, the filter criteria has to be set and is logical connected with an "OR" operation type: array items: type: string example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 maxItems: 128 required: - key - operator - value x-object-version: 1.5 x-object-model: false filters_ov1_5: title: filters description: Multiple filters are linked with logical "OR" operator type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/filter_ov1_5' maxItems: 10 x-object-version: 1.5 x-object-model: true color_ov1_6: title: color description: > Multiple vehicle color based on the type of the vehicle. - CL00028, CL00050, CL00312, CL00313 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: object properties: type: description: The type of the color according to finish, interior, top and paint. type: string enum: - FINISH - INTERIOR - TOP - PAINT example: INTERIOR code: description: The color code of the type. type: string example: TO description: description: The color description of the type. type: string example: Titanschwarz/Titanschwarz/Titanschwarz/St.Tropez x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true drive_kind_ov1_6: title: drive_kind description: > Drive kind. Drive kind may be used to specify the drive as 'front wheel', 'rear wheel' or 'all-wheel' drive. The default value assumed is 'unknown', which also must be agreed if the attribute is not stated. - CL00037, CL00314, CL01291 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: object properties: code: description: Drive kind (code) of the vehicle. type: string example: F description: description: Drive kind (description) of the vehicle. type: string example: FRONT_WHEEL x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true engine_ov1_6: title: engine description: engine data type: object properties: engine_code: description: > The two- or three-digit engine code (e.g. BFH). - CL00029 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: CKU x-code-list: CL00029 engine_code_extension: description: > Extension to the engine code (optional). - CL00030 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: B x-code-list: CL00030 engine_type: description: > Engine type as an abstract description like EM (emission motor) or DM (diesel motor). - CL00031, CL00316, CL01296 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: PetrolMotor x-code-list: CL00031, CL00316, CL01296 engine_description: description: >- Description of the engine. This attribute is influenced by the "accept-language" according to RFC4646. type: string maxLength: 4096 example: 2.5 L TDI combustion_mode: description: The principle of how the combustion is initiated according to CL01292. type: string example: O x-code-list: >- CL01292 The way/principle the combustion is initiated - managed externally by FAM fuel_types: description: > Code for the fuel type used in this model. - CL00023, CL00317, CL01305 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: description: This object describes the fuel type. type: object properties: code: description: The code of the fuel type. type: string example: 'N' description: description: The name of the fuel type type: string example: regular petrol x-code-list: CL00023, CL00317, CL01305 cylinder_count: description: Count of cylinders. type: integer format: int8 minimum: 1 maximum: 16 example: 4 capacity: description: > - value related to the capacity unit of the vehicle engine - Capacity (e.g. 3200). The 'unit' attribute states the unit of measure. - Permittable values are determined by content of the codelist CL00124 type: number format: int16 minimum: 0 example: 3200 capacity_unit: description: > - unit related to the capacity value of the vehicle engine - Unit of measure of the measure type value. - Values allowed in the 'unit' attribute are determined by one of the code lists - CL00124 Volume units, Weight units, Length units, Liquid volume units, Odometer reading units, Consumption units,Emission units, Power units, Time units, Packaging units - CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string maxLength: 255 example: ccm x-code-list: - CL00124 VolumeUnitCodeCodelist Non liquid volume units of measure power: description: Value related to the power unit of the vehicle engine type: number format: int16 minimum: 0 example: 183 power_unit: description: > The 'unit' attribute states the unit of engine power measure. Permittable values are determined by content of the codelist CL00181. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: hp x-code-list: CL00181 torque: description: > Engine torque (e.g. 500). The 'unit' attribute states the unit of measure. Permittable values are determined by content of the codelist CL01270. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: integer format: int16 minimum: 0 example: 500 x-code-list: CL01270 torque_unit: description: > Unit of measure of the measure type value. Values allowed in the 'unit' attribute are determined by one of the code lists Volume units, Weight units, Length units, Liquid volume units, Odometer reading units, Consumption units, Emission units, Power units, Time units, Packaging units - CL01270 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: Nm x-code-list: CL01270 x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true sim_ov1_6: title: sim description: Object contains several SIM card IDs. type: object properties: imei: description: >- The International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) is a unique numerical identifier for every mobile device. A standard IMEI number is a 14 digit string, with an additional 15th check digit for verifying the entire string. type: string maxLength: 15 example: '212345678901234' imsi: description: >- An International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI) is a unique number, usually fifteen digits, associated with the Global System for Mobile Communications (GSM) and the Universal Mobile Telecommunications System (UMTS) network mobile phone users. The IMSI is a unique number identifying a GSM subscriber. type: string maxLength: 15 example: '262019876543210' iccid: description: >- The Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (ICCID) identifies each SIM internationally. type: string maxLength: 20 example: '21234567890123456789' euiccid: description: >- The embedded Universal Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (eUICCID) is the unique identifier of the embedded SIM card. type: string maxLength: 32 example: '12345678901234567890123456789012' x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true transmission_ov1_6: title: transmission description: transmission data type: object properties: code: description: > The two- or three-digit transmission code (e.g. FMP or FGT, if the kind is AWD). - CL00035 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: FMP x-code-list: CL00035 kind: description: > Kind of transmission (e.g. 'AdditionalTransmission', 'MainTransmission'). - CL00025 type: string example: MainTransmission x-code-list: CL00025 type: description: > List of type of transmission as an abstract definition. - CL00036, CL00319, CL01295 CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: array items: description: transmission type of the vehicle type: object properties: code: description: The code of the transmission. type: string example: M description: description: Readable transmission description. type: string example: manual transmission x-code-list: CL00036, CL00319, CL01295 description: description: Readable transmission description. type: string example: Manual x-object-version: 1.6 x-object-model: true vehicle_ov1_6: title: vehicle description: >- Multiple vehicle information according to the vehicle identification number (vin) type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true brand_name: description: > Brand name of the manufacturer describes the brand inside and outside of the Volkswagen Group (e.g. VOLKSWAGEN PKW). type: string maxLength: 255 example: VOLKSWAGEN PKW brand_code: description: > CL00003 Brand of the manufacturer. CL00441 contains all brand including VW Group's brands CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: V x-code-list: CL00003, CL00441, CL00309 model: $ref: '#/definitions/model_ov1_3' vehicle_ident: $ref: '#/definitions/vehicle_ident_ov1_2' drive_kind: $ref: '#/definitions/drive_kind_ov1_6' transmissions: description: Mutiple transmission data type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/transmission_ov1_6' engines: description: Mutiple engine data type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/engine_ov1_6' equipment_options: description: Mutiple equipment data type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/equipment_option_ov1_3' dealers: description: Multiple referenced dealer based on the defined role type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/dealer_ref_ov1_3' pkn: description: Production identification number (optional) type: string maxLength: 13 example: 15 8 5805 country_composition: description: > Country composition indicator, manufacturer dependent. PR number as indicator for country specific offer program like X3A for france. - CL(PRNumber) CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository - https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls type: string example: X10 x-code-list: CL(PRNumber) country_composition_iso: description: > Registration country of the vehicle in ISO 3166 Alpha-2-Code based on country_composition PR number. Country composition ISO is based on TPL PR family (direct mapping with b-code-list). type: string example: FR colors: description: Multiple colors of the vehicle. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/color_ov1_6' life_data: $ref: '#/definitions/life_data_ov1_3' components: description: >- Technical components. This element defines an alternate view to the Vehicle. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/component_ov1_3' telematic_device: $ref: '#/definitions/telematic_device_ov1_3' data_expire_at: type: cdis_components_ov1: title: cdis_components description: Contains Car on Demand Innovation Solution (CDIS) box component data. type: object properties: vin: description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle. type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: HZW000000VW007412 components: description: List of components related to the vehicle. type: array items: description: Component related to the vehicle. type: object properties: box_id: description: Unique Car on Demand Innovation Solution (CDIS) box ID. type: string example: A5E8pxMbby5eFjRfb2RQNW4/jXxSaaZiPWtrMSyZ1v4s type_id: description: Identifier of the component type. type: string example: cdis part_number: description: Part number of the component. type: string example: 10A.035.751 10A.035.751 X0X X00X sw_version: description: Version of the software. type: string example: 10A.035.751-X00X hw_version: description: Version of the hardware. type: string example: 10A.063.209-X0X manufacturer: description: Manufacturer of the component. type: string example: Fuba sim: description: Contains Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) card information. type: object properties: network_operator: description: >- Network operator of the component's Subscriber Identity Module (SIM). type: string example: Vodafone iccid: description: >- Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (ICCID), which is the unique identification number of the Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) card. type: string example: 893004234814455936F imei: description: >- International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI), which is the unique serial number for each Global System for Mobile Communications (GSM) or Universal Mobile Telecommunications System (UMTS) device. type: string example: 351756051523999 imsi: description: >- International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI), which is stored in the Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) and uniquely identifies every user of a cellular network. type: string example: 262029745642210 component check request. type: object properties: processing_status: description: >- Current status of the process as enumeration of the values "OPEN", "IN_PROGRESS", "DONE" and "FAILED". type: string enum: - OPEN - IN_PROGRESS - DONE - FAILED vin: description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle. type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: LSVZZZG3ZNP000606 ecus: description: A list of Electronic Control Units (ECUs). type: array items: description: Electronic Control Unit (ECU). type: object properties: diagnostic_address: description: >- Electronic Control Unit (ECU) address as 4-digit hexadecimal code. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 1 master_related_diagnostic_address: description: >- Master related Electronic Control Unit (ECU) address as 4-digit hexadecimal code. type: string maxLength: 4 example: 1 return_code: description: >- Return code for the processing status of an ECU component detection provided by KryptoTU according to CL01527. type: string example: acknowledged warranty_exclusion_code_status: description: >- Status of the current warranty exclusion code according to CL01593. type: string example: Never warranty_exclusion_code: description: >- Code of the warranty exclusion, which defines the kind of change of the vehicle. type: string maxLength: 3 example: TD1 oem_processing_timestamp: description: >- Timestamp, which status of a request from the ECUTuningDetectionService provided by KryptoTU according to CL01527. type: string example: acknowledged x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true compressed_data_ov1: Only values from the given codelist are valid according to CL01251. type: string enum: - 7bit - 8bit - quoted-printable - base64 bytes_compressed: description: >- Bytes amount of the compressed data stream to enable data integrity testing. type: integer bytes_uncompressed: description: >- Bytes amount of the uncompressed data stream to enable data integrity testing. type: integer required: - data_stream - data_stream_mime_code x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true construction_information_ov1: title: construction_information description: Contains the construction information according to the processing ID. type: object properties: processing_status: title: processing_status description: >- Current status ("OPEN", "IN_PROGRESS", "DONE" and "FAILED") of the process as enumeration. type: string example: FAILED enum: - OPEN - IN_PROGRESS - DONE - FAILED x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true request_creation_date: title: request_creation_date description: Date of request to Service42. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-06-15T14:07:17Z' x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true response_reception_date: title: response_reception_date description: Date of response (Callback service) from Service42. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-06-15T14:08:17Z' x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true wsdl_version: title: wsdl_version description: >- Number of the current Web Services Description Language (WSDL) version that the requesting system uses. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 1.12.1 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true process_information: $ref: '#/definitions/process_information_ov1' processing_id: title: processing_id description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation. 006D sg_version_id: description: Identifier of the ECU type: string example: 10491359 sgv_status_id: description: > Status ID related to the approval of the usage of the control module (in German: "Steuergeräte Verwendungsgenehmigung"), * e.g. "200" for "OPEN" * e.g. "201" for "PREPARED" * e.g. "261" for "RELEASED_KD" type: integer maxLength: 3 example: 200 spare_part_number: description: > Identifier to determine the VOLKSWAGEN AG spare part number of an ECU (in German: "VW/Audi-Teilenummer") without dots and without ending spaces type: string maxLength: 18 example: 992941572AA hw_version_id: description: ECU hardware version identifier type: string maxLength: 255 example: 10141877 ecu_part_number: description: > Identifier to determine the reference ECU hardware and the compatibility of the ECU hardware (in German: "Hardware Referenz-Teilenummer") without dots and without ending spaces type: string maxLength: 18 example: 992941572A hw_version_number: description: sw_version_number: description: Version of the software as 4-digit code type: string maxLength: 255 example: 9002 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true ecu_models_ov1: title: ecu_models description: List of ECU models type: object properties: ecu_models: type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_model_ov1' required: - ecu_models x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true ecu_ref_ov1: title: ecu_ref description: TBD type: object properties: serial_no: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD fazit_id: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 23 example: TBD x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true ecu_update_ov1: title: ecu_update description: >- Contains Electronic Control Unit (ECU) information to update documentation in corresponding OEM system. type: object properties: user_id: description: User identifier assigned by the leading identity management system. type: string maxLength: 50 example: WCDP_ORU process_information: description: Contains process relevant information. type: object properties: task_type: description: >- Type of the task for the process according to CL01422. "7" is defined as default value to ensure documentation with OEM system. Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. type: string example: '7' change_types: description: | List of Parameter that is needed to fullfill the task. type: array items: type: object properties: value: description: >- Value of parameter. Often this value is the same as ecu_information.diagnostic_information.diagnostic_address. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 005F parameter: description: >- Type of the parameter, e.g. value of change code for the type quick check via change code according to CL01432. Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. type: string example: ComponentRef required: - value - parameter required: - task_type - change_types tester_information: description: Contains tester relevant information. type: object properties: label: description: > Model of diagnostic tester, which used to identify the type of the tester according to CL01420. Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. type: string example: OEM.IL id: description: Tester ID provided by the tester. type: string maxLength: 255 example: WCDP_ORU serial: description: Serial number of tester provided by the tester. type: string maxLength: 255 example: APP-33625 partner_number: description: >- The Partner number is a 5-digit alphanumeric string (e.g. 74623) given by the importer and only valid in the context of a brand and country. type: string maxLength: 5 example: 74623 wholesaler_number: description: >- The wholesaler number identifies a wholesaler. The WholesalerNumber is stored in the Group Importer System KVPS as BID. type: string maxLength: 3 example: '444' base_sw_version: description: >- Version of the tester's base software, which is needed for the support in error cases. type: string maxLength: 255 example: '1.9' diagnostic_sw_version: description: >- Version of the tester's diagnostic software, which is needed for the support in error cases. type: string maxLength: 255 example: '1.9' brand_code: description: > Brand of the Vehicle according to CL00003, * e.g. code value "V" for description "VW PKW" * e.g. code value "N" for description "VW Nutzfahrzeuge" Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. type: string maxLength: 1 example: V required: - label - id - partner_number - wholesaler_number - base_sw_version - diagnostic_sw_version - brand_code vehicle_information: description: Contains vehicle relevant information. type: object properties: vin_origin: description: >- Origin of the identifier, which defines whether the VIN was typed in manually or read by diagnostic tester. type: string maxLength: 255 example: DiagnosticTester odometer_reading: description: Contains odometer information. type: array items: type: object properties: value: type: string description: Mileage value of the odometer. example: 12930 unit: type: string description: >- Mileage unit of the odometer according to CL00129. Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. example: km required: - value - unit required: - vin_origin - odometer_reading ecu_information: description: Information about affected Electronic Control Units (ECUs). type: array items: type: object properties: id: type: string description: >- Unique identifer within Volkswagen AG provided by the system FAZIT for ECUs, which are relevant for theft protection. maxLength: 23 diagnostic_information: type: object description: Contains diagnostic information. properties: diagnostic_address: type: string description: >- Electronic Control Unit (ECU) address as 4-digit hexadecimal code. Use left-hand zeros if necessary. maxLength: 4 example: 005F master_related_diagnostic_adress: type: string description: >- Master related Electronic Control Unit (ECU) address as 4-digit hexadecimal code. Use left-hand zeros if necessary. maxLength: 4 example: 005F ecu_type: type: string description: >- Type of the component according to CL00005. Volkswagen codeslists are defined by system owners in the IA Repository (https://ia/ia-gov-webclient/#/cls) or are externally managed. Note that the listed examples may not be up-to-date. Please refer always to the newest codelist. example: Slave required: - diagnostic_address ecu_part_number: type: string description: Spare part number of hardware. maxLength: 18 example: 282005491149392400 hw_part_number: type: string description: Spare part number of electronic part number. maxLength: 18 example: 1A2345678B hw_version: type: string description: Version string of the hardware as 3-digit code. maxLength: 255 example: Z05 sw_version: type: string description: Version string of the software as 4-digit code. maxLength: 255 example: XB01 component_check_code: type: string description: >- Identification string of some technical component parameters to enable checking of vehicles tuning activities. maxLength: 8192 process_parameter: type: object properties: just_flashed: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether a update has been processed within this repair (triggered by a previous request). supports_flash: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indictates, whether the Electronic Control Unit (ECU) is flashable or not. True, if the ECU is flashable, otherwise false. just_coded: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether a coding has been processed within this repair (triggered by a previous request). just_parametrized: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether a parametrizing has been processed within this repair (triggered by a previous request). flash_always: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether the Electronic Control Unit (ECU) must be flashed only when a delta exisits by comparing actual versus target. True, only in case of a delta, otherwise false. repair_time: type: string format: date-time example: '1985-04-12T23:20:50.52Z' description: >- Repair time. Only time is relevant - date will be set to null. just_software_configured: type: boolean example: false description: True, if just configured, otherwise false. just_swap_activated: type: boolean example: false description: True, if just swap activated, otherwise false. just_adjust_calibrated: type: boolean example: false description: >- Indicates, whether the calibration has been adjusted within this repair (triggered by a previous request). just_calibration_proofed: type: boolean example: false description: >- True, if calibration was executed but without deviation, otherwise false. asam_data: type: object properties: asam_file_identifier: type: string description: ASAM data file identifier. maxLength: 255 asam_file_version: type: string maxLength: 9 description: ASAM file version. required: - asam_file_identifier - asam_file_version required: - diagnostic_information - ecu_part_number - hw_part_number - hw_version - sw_version - process_parameter required: - user_id - tester_information - process_information - vehicle_information - ecu_information x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true equipment_option_ov1: title: equipment_option description: TBD type: object properties: option_code: description: TBD type: string example: TBD family: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD required: - option_code x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true fault_ov1: title: fault description: Contains error descriptions in case of an error. type: object properties: system: description: >- System, which recognized the fault according to CL00015. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string maxLength: 10 example: RCL class: description: >- Class of the fault, which determines the responsible party for fault handling according to CL00267. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string maxLength: 10 example: technical code: description: >- Code of the fault, which determines the technical identifier for a type of fault. type: string maxLength: 4 example: '9026' level: description: >- Level of the fault, which determines the severity of the fault and indicated level of recovery to be done according to CL00268. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string minLength: 1 maxLength: 1 example: W id: description: >- ID of the fault, which is generated by the fault system. The fault ID is mandatory for error level and optional for information. Additionally, the fault ID is used by the support to find further information in the system logs. type: string maxLength: 100 example: 6e26c196-a7b5-408f-865d-3a7cfbeec562 detection_date: description: Date of detection of the fault. type: string format: date-time example: '2015-05-28T14:07:17Z' error_description: description: Manual readable description of the fault. type: string maxLength: 4096 code_details: description: List of parameters of the fault code details. type: array items: description: Parameter of the fault code details. type: object properties: parameter_name: description: Name of the parameter of the fault code details. type: string maxLength: 100 example: '9026' parameter_value: description: Value of the parameter of the fault code details. type: string maxLength: 100 example: Technical validation error system_details: description: List of parameters of the fault system details. type: array items: description: Parameter of the fault system details. type: object properties: parameter_name: description: >- Name of the parameter of the fault system details according to CL00269. CodeLists are defined in the IA Repository of Volkswagen. type: string maxLength: 100 example: Application parameter_value: description: Value of the parameter of the fault system details. type: string maxLength: 100 example: CSP-IA-GW@WSGWCPNQ2-WOB reason: description: Reason of the fault, which may be used for nested fault conditions. type: string maxLength: 255 example: BAD REQUEST x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_config_ov1: title: flash_config description: > Contains the configurations and instructions how and what flash container shall be created. type: object properties: vehicle_product_key: description: key of vehicle product type: string maxLength: 4 example: 10A ecu_metadata_type: description: > Type of ecu meta data Choose one of the enumeration values to determine the type of ecu meta information, which should be requested. If no value is chosen, no ecu metadata is requested. * e.g. choose value "SOURCE", if the source meta information should be requested. The source meta information is those kind of meta information, which has the lowest order number. * e.g. choose value "TARGET", if the target meta information should be requested. The target metainformation is those kind of meta information, which has the highest order number. * e.g. choose "ALL", if both source meta information and target meta information should be requested. type: string enum: - SOURCE - TARGET - ALL container_types: description: > List of types of flash containers Choose one or more of the enumeration values to determine the type of flash container, which should be requested. Choose values with the prefix "FULL" respectively "PARTIAL", if a full respectively patial flash container should be created, signed and transferred for the ECU state or choose values with the suffix "SOURCE" respectively "TARGET", if a source repsectively target flash container should be created, signed and transferred for the ECU state. Choose "ALL" as short way to request all combinations at maximum. If no value is chosen, no flash data container is requested. * e.g. choose "PARTIAL_SOURCE", if a partial source flash container should be created. * e.g. choose "FULL_TARGET", if a full target flash container should be created. * e.g. choose "ALL", if all four enumeration combinations should be requested. type: array items: type: string enum: - PARTIAL_SOURCE - FULL_SOURCE - PARTIAL_TARGET - FULL_TARGET - ALL execute_binary_check: description: >- True, if equality check of two flash blocks by comparing the binaries should be executed, false if only the logical software block version should be used as check. type: boolean signing_algorithm: description: >- Name of the signing algorithm that shall be executed as enumeration, e.g. ECC 256 (NIST P-256). type: string enum: - ECC 256 (NIST P-256) flash_sw: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_sw_ov1' required: - vehicle_product_key - execute_binary_check - signing_algorithm x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_container_ov1: title: flash_container description: Created flash container type: object properties: creation_type: description: > Type of created flash container. The type of created flash container is defined as enumeration. If the type of flash container is not defined, then no flash container was created. type: string enum: - PARTIAL_SOURCE - FULL_SOURCE - PARTIAL_TARGET - FULL_TARGET container_name: description: >- Name of the source or target flash container, that was initially transferred in the request. type: string maxLength: 100 example: 4N0907777B_H51_4N0907777Q_2013 download_id: description: >- Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) in hexadecimal notation to download the signed (partial) flash container. The file must be available at least for 7 days. type: string format: uuid example: 550e8400-e29b-11d4-a716-446655440000 download_expiration_date: description: Date and time when download expires type: string format: date-time package_size: description: >- Size of all flash blocks in the (partial) flash container rounded up in full MBs. type: integer example: 399 checksum: description: >- Message-Digest Algorithm 5 (MD5) checksum hexadecimal representation of the created file. type: string maxLength: 32 example: 8b14ed616aa4213ff418c78f987b6a5d x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_container_status_ov1: title: flash_container_status description: Contains the results of flash container creation type: object properties: processing_status: description: >- Current status of the process as enumeration of the values "OPEN", "IN_PROGRESS", "DONE" and "FAILED" type: string enum: - OPEN - IN_PROGRESS - DONE - FAILED done_containers: description: >- Current number of progressed flash containers, which are ready for download type: integer example: 2 total_containers: description: Total number of flash containers, which has to be progressed type: integer example: 4 target_ecu_meta: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_meta_ov1' source_ecu_meta: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_meta_ov1' flash_containers: description: List of the created flash container type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_container_ov1' required: - processing_status x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_element_ov1: title: flash_element type: object properties: order: description: > Order of the flash elements. The order number is used to compare flash software, which is required for bootloader updates. If the number of corresponding source and target softwares is not equal, a partial flash is not possible. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES a comparison of target software between different order numbers is done. * e.g. the first source flash softwares must be compared to the first target flash softwares. * e.g. the second source flash softwares to the second target flash softwares. * e.g. the first target flash softwares can be compared to the second target flash softwares. type: integer example: 1 source_sg_version_id: description: >- ID to check whether the (source) approval for the ECU is available. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10330791 source_sw_version_id: description: >- OEM specific ID to retrieve the corresponding source version. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10222781 target_sg_version_id: description: ID to check whether the (target) approval for the ECU is available. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10422344 target_sw_version_id: description: OEM specific ID to retrieve the corresponding target version. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 10191592 target_document_id: description: ID for document to retrieve a specific file from OEM system. type: string maxLength: 50 example: 11341440 required: - order x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true flash_sw_ov1: title: flash_sw description: >- Container for the definition of the source and target flash software. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES only target flash software information is necessary. type: object properties: source_container_name: description: > Name of source flash container, which should be considered for the flash container creation process. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. Choose a name for the source flash container. The name is defined without file ending (e.g. "zip") and will be used for further process steps to provide the final flash container(s). type: string maxLength: 100 example: 4N0907777B_H51_4N0907777Q_2013 target_container_name: description: > Name of target flash container, which should be considered for the flash container creation process Choose a name for the target flash container. The name is defined without file ending (e.g. "zip") and will be used for further process steps to provide the final flash container(s). type: string maxLength: 100 example: 4N0907777B_H51_4N0907777AE_2016 flash_elements: description: List of flash software. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/flash_element_ov1' target_ecu_parameters: description: >- A list of key value pairs which constitute the content of the ECU parameter file of the target ECU packages (full forward and/or partial forward). If the ECU_parameters is not set an empty txt with the name ECU_parameters.txt shall be added to the flash container. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_key_value_ov1' source_ecu_parameters: description: >- A list of key value pairs which constitute the content of the ECU parameter file of the source ECU packages (rollback and/or partial rollback). If the ECU_parameters is not set an empty txt with the name ECU_parameters.txt shall be added to the flash container. In case of container type FULL_TARGET_FLASH_FILES this attribute can be ignored. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/ecu_key_value_ov1' required: - flash_elements x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true fod_manifest_ov1: title: fod_manifest description: FOD manifest of manifest container. type: object properties: fod_name: description: >- Filename on Content Delivery Network (CDN) or inline in the CompressedData. type: string example: TBD data_integrity_list: description: List of integrity data. type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/data_integrity_ov1' compressed_data: $ref: '#/definitions/compressed_data_ov1' required: - fod_name x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true lifecycle_vehicle_ov1: title: lifecycle_vehicle description: Lifecycle information about a specific vehicle. type: object properties: vin: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true category: description: >- Category of the vehicle. Most vehicles are customer vehicles. However, there are some vehicles produced for testing purposes. type: string example: Customer vehicle basic_data: description: Contains basic data of the vehicle. type: object properties: status: description: Status of the basic data according to the OEM system. type: integer format: int32 example: 0 message: description: Message related to the basic data according to the OEM system. type: string example: TBD value: description: Value of the basic data according to the OEM system. type: object properties: production_number: description: >- Cryptic production identifier of the vehicle. This number is only used for flashing purposes after the production date (ZP8 - "Zählpunkt 8"). Otherwise, there is a known risk to create doublets, which should be avoided. type: string maxLength: 13 example: 2125641112018 brand_code: description: Brand code of the manufacturer according to CL00003. type: string x-code-list: CL00003 example: V brand_name: description: Brand name of the manufacturer. type: string example: Volkswagen PKW sales_type: description: > Model indication of an order as a concatenated 6 digit value according to the TMAIMG format. * type model (TM) order key of the vehicle class - 2 digits, * body index (A) as version, e.g. "3" for "Coupe" - 1 digit, * comfort level index (I) - 1 digit, * engine index (M) - 1 digit, * gear index (G) - 1 digit. These models have to be valid in "Modellbezeichnung Vertrieb" (MBV) and LMTAB. type: string maxLength: 6 example: 3H735Z model_text_short: description: Name of the model as a short description text. type: string example: A11 model_text_long: description: Name of the model as a long description text. type: string example: 1J1RZ7 model_year: description: Year of the model (edition). type: string example: 2007 model_group: description: >- Group of model according to IFA ("Integrierte Fahrzeug Auftragssteuerung"), which is allocated to the order in accordance with its model key. The model group is mainly represented by the first three digits by LMTAB. Synonymous terms are class or vehicle class. type: string example: TIEOR 2M production_plant: description: Identifier of the production plant with leading zero. type: string maxLength: 3 example: '028' zp7_date: description: Date of the ZP7 ("Zählpunkt 7") according to RFC3339. type: string format: date 'x-code-list:': RFC3339 example: '2022-07-29' zp8_date: description: >- Actual date of the production of the vehicle (ZP8 - "Zählpunkt 8") according to RFC3339. type: string format: date 'x-code-list:': RFC3339 example: '2022-07-29' zp8_date_planned: description: >- Planned date of the production of the vehicle according to RFC3339. type: string format: date 'x-code-list:': RFC3339 example: '2022-07-29' exterior_color: description: Code of the exterior color of the vehicle. type: string maxLength: 2 example: 2T exterior_color_text: description: Description of the exterior color of the vehicle. type: string example: Deep Black Perleffekt interior_color: description: Code of the interior color of the vehicle. type: string maxLength: 2 example: TO interior_color_text: description: Description of the interior color of the vehicle. type: string example: Titanschwarz/Titanschwarz/Titanschwarz/Mistralgrau roof_color: description: Code of the roof color of the vehicle. type: string maxLength: 2 example: 2T roof_color_text: description: Description of the roof color of the vehicle. type: string example: Deep Black Perleffekt country_composition: description: >- Country composition indicator, which refers to the country specific features e.g. the value X9X which indicates a particularly hot or cold country or a special pollen filter. Vehicles can be modified after the production date (ZP8). type: string example: X9X country_composition_version: description: Version of the country composition indicator. type: string example: 1 knock_down_code: description: Code of the knock down method. type: string example: F color_code1: description: >- Code of the paint material, which refers to the exterior color code. type: string maxLength: 4 example: LC9X color_code2: description: >- Code of the paint material, which refers to the interior color code. type: string maxLength: 4 example: LC9X color_code3: description: >- Code of the paint material, which refers to the roof color code. type: string maxLength: 4 example: LC9X production_subsidiary: description: Unique identifier of the producing subsidiary. type: string example: '0100' invoice_number: description: >- Internal number of the invoice before vehicle delivery and after ZP8 ("Zählpunkt 8").
