The processing status OPEN is usually returned within a very short period, e.g. if the consumer requests the processing status immediately after triggering the asynchronous process.\n* IN_PROGRESS: The process has been started.\n* DONE: The process has been done. The consumer is finally able to request the vehicle results via the endpoint GET /vehicles/process/{processing_id}/result. Please note that for the endpoint GET /vehicles/process/{processing_id}/result the processing status DONE (HTTP status code 200) is also returned, even if an error occurred on the OEM side (CarPort, GVF) for a specific vehicle. In this particular case, specific error objects are used to notify the consumer accordingly.\_\n* FAILED: The process failed due to an OEM.IL internal error. The consumer needs to retry the whole process.\n" type: string enum: - OPEN - DONE - IN_PROGRESS - FAILED example: IN_PROGRESS processed_vins_number: description: >- Current number of progressed VINs, which are ready for download via GET /vehicles/process/{processing_id}/result. type: integer example: 18453 total_vins_number: description: Total number of VINs, which has to be progressed. type: integer example: 20000 required: - processing_status - processed_vins_number - total_vins_number x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true process_processing_id_result_ov1: title: process_processing_id_result description: Contains the processing status result for the requested vehicles. type: object properties: oem_source: description: Source system which provides the list of vehicles as enumeration. type: string enum: - GVF - CarPort example: CarPort vehicles: type: array description: >- List of CarPort vehicles. filters x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true subscription_id_ov1: title: subscription_id description: This object contains an assigned subscription ID for a specific filter. type: object properties: subscription_id: description: >- This attribute determines the ID which is used for the subscription according to a specific filter. type: string format: uuid example: MYAPP-ivwb1035-3819312000000-32767-ADE x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true subscription_imports_ov1: title: subscription_imports description: >- This object contains a list of imports and according count of vehicles based on an assigned subscription ID for a specific filter. type: object properties: imports: description: The list of imports. type: array items: description: The list contains a date of import and the count of vehicles. type: object properties: import_date: description: The date of imported vehicles from OEM backend system. type: string format: date-time example: '2019-12-09T09:05:56.000Z' vehicle_count: description: The number of vehicles listed in according import. type: integer example: 1000 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true subscription_vins_ov1: title: subscription_vins description: Contains a list of paged vins according to subscription id. type: object properties: subscription_id: description: >- This attribute determines the ID which is used for the subscription according to a specific filter. type: string format: uuid example: MYAPP-ivwb1035-3819312000000-32767-ADE vins: description: List of vins related to a given subscription ID. type: array items: title: vin description: Unique vehicle identification number of the vehicle type: string minLength: 17 maxLength: 17 example: WVWZZZAUZFW900000 x-object-version: 1.3 x-object-model: true offset: description: > Offset (start pointer) of vehicles returned. Start Pointer (paging) is depending on attribute "limit". If no value is defined, then value is set to 0 per default. The minimum value is defined as 0. type: integer default: 0 minimum: 0 example: 0 limit: description: > Maximum number of vehicles returned in the response at once. If no value is defined, then value is set to 20 per default. The minimum value is defined as 1. type: integer default: 20 minimum: 1 example: 20 total: description: Total number of available vehicles, which are returned. type: integer example: 20 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true subscriptions_ov1: title: subscriptions description: Subscriptions for a specific tenant type: object properties: subscriptions: type: array description: List of subscriptions of a specific client. items: $ref: '#/definitions/subscription_ov1' number_created: description: Total amount of subscriptions created by consumer. type: integer example: 11 number_remaining: description: >- Total amount of remaining subscriptions, which may be created by consumer. type: integer example: 89 limit: description: Limit of subscriptions defined for the consumer. type: integer example: 100 x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true sw_blocks_ov1: title: sw_blocks description: TBD type: array items: description: TBD type: object properties: block_no: title: block_no description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true block_version: title: block_version description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true block_update: description: TBD type: boolean example: true required: - block_version x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true task_ov1: title: task description: Object, which specifies the task for the process. type: object properties: type: description: >- Type of task. For example, software enabling or quick check via change code. type: string example: APS-UC sw_config_behaviour: description: TBD type: object properties: production_content: description: TBD type: boolean example: true aftersales_content: description: TBD type: boolean example: true required: - production_content - aftersales_content parameters: description: List of parameter that is needed to fulfill the task. type: array items: description: Parameter that is needed to fulfill the task. type: object properties: parameter_value: description: Value of parameter. type: string maxLength: 255 example: ORUMASSNAHME1 parameter_type: description: Type of parameter. type: string example: ChangeCode required: - parameter_value - parameter_type required: - type x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true technical_data_ov1: title: technical_data description: TBD type: object properties: equipments: description: TBD type: array items: description: TBD type: object properties: equipment_options: description: TBD type: array items: $ref: '#/definitions/equipment_option_ov1' x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true tester_version_ov1: title: tester_version description: TBD type: object properties: tester_software_version: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD tester_data_version: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD tester_major_version: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD ecf: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD brand_code: description: TBD type: string example: TBD vehicle_communication_interface: description: TBD type: object properties: type: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD communication: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD connection: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD serial: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 255 example: TBD required: - type - communication - connection sod_application_version: description: TBD type: string maxLength: 64 example: TBD required: - tester_software_version - tester_data_version - brand_code x-object-version: 1 x-object-model: true vehicle_contracts_ov1: title: vehicle_contracts description: Contains vehicles contracts. type: object properties: contracts: description: List of vehicle contracts. type: array items: description: Vehicle Contract. type: object properties: id: description: >- ID of the contract, which may only be unique within a special context (e.g. dealer context). The context depends on the use case according to the OEM system. type: string maxLength: 255 example: 183183 processing_information: description: >- Contains information, which are not related to the business content. type: object properties: data_origin: description: >- Origin of the contract data according to CL01360. This information may be used to process the business data. type: string example: CP registration_date: description: >- Date of first registration in the OEM system according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-05-03T00:00:00.000Z' registration_originator: description: >- User ID or system as the originator of the contract/data set registration, who is responsible for the processing information step. This attribute shall only be used if the OEM system is unable to dissolve the information. type: string maxLength: 255 example: registration originator modification_date: description: Date of modification in the OEM system according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-05-03T00:00:00.000Z' modification_originator: description: >- User ID or system as the originator of the contract/data set modification, who is responsible for the processing information step. This attribute shall only be used if the OEM system is unable to dissolve the information. type: string maxLength: 255 example: modification originator creation_date: description: Date of creation in the OEM system according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-05-03T00:00:00.000Z' creation_originator: description: >- Dealer ID as the originator of the contract/data set creation, who is responsible for the processing information step. type: object properties: dealer_id: description: >- Identifier of the business partner in applications. Only the combination of country, brand and partner number identifies a dealer uniquely. type: object properties: country: description: >- Country of the dealer according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-3. type: string maxLength: 3 example: DEU brand: description: Brand of the dealer according to CL00003. type: string example: V partner_number: description: >- Number of the partner as 5 digit alphanumeric string. type: string maxLength: 5 example: 74623 required: - country - brand - partner_number required: - dealer_id approval_date: description: >- Date of approval for the creation or modification of the contract/data set in the OEM system according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-05-03T00:00:00.000Z' approval_originator: description: >- Wholesaler ID as the originator of the contract/data set creation, who is responsible for the processing information step. type: object properties: wholesaler_id: description: >- Identifier of the wholesaler in applications. Only the combination of country, brand and partner number identifies a wholesaler uniquely. type: object properties: country: description: >- Country of the wholesaler according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-3. type: string maxLength: 3 example: DEU brand: description: Brand of the wholesaler according to CL00003. type: string example: V wholesaler_number: description: Number of the wholesaler as 3 digit numeric string. type: string maxLength: 3 example: 623 required: - country - brand - wholesaler_number required: - wholesaler_id invoice_date: description: >- Date of invoice of the contract/data set in the OEM system according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-05-03T00:00:00.000Z' invoice_originator: description: >- User ID or system as the originator of the contract/data set invoice, who is responsible for the processing information step. This attribute shall only be used if the OEM system is unable to dissolve the information. type: string maxLength: 255 example: invoice originator contract_parties: description: List of contract parties. type: array items: description: Contract party. type: object properties: business_identifiers: description: List of business IDs. type: array items: description: Business ID. type: object properties: type: description: >- Type of the business ID for the contracting party according to CL00070. type: string example: CompanyRegistrationNumber id: description: Value of the business ID for the contracting party. type: string maxLength: 60 example: GB123456789 role: description: Role of the contracting party according to CL01298. type: string example: lessee of a contract status: description: Status of the contract according to CL00042. type: string example: active provisional_status: description: >- Indicates whether the contract is provisional. The value "true" is returned, if the contract is provisional. The value "false" is returned, if the contract is not provisional. type: boolean example: true type: description: Type of the contract according to CL00044 respectively CL01269. type: string example: ServiceContract category: description: >- Subdivision of the contract type. Each market specifies its own categories. For example, the category "3Years100.000km" may relate to the contract type "FollowUpWarranty". type: string example: 3Years100.000k description: description: >- Description of the contract, which does not include terms of the contract respectively the contract conditions. type: string maxLength: 4096 example: contract description signature_date: description: >- Date of contract signature by the involved contract parties according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2007-03-18T00:00:00.000Z' start_date: description: Date of the contract start according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2007-03-23T00:00:00.000Z' expiration_date: description: Date of the contract expiration according to RFC3339. type: string format: date-time example: '2021-05-03T00:00:00.000Z' duration: description: >- Duration of the contract in days. This attribute is only relevant for provisional contracts. In case of non-provisional contracts, the duration of the contract is calculated with the help of the attributes "start_date" and "expiration_date". type: integer example: 10 start_mileage: description: Contains the mileage runtime at the contract date. type: object properties: value: description: Value of the runtime at the contract date. type: string example: 12678 unit: description: >- Unit of the runtime at the contract date according to CL00129. type: string example: km required: - unit end_mileage: description: Contains the mileage runtime limit of the contract. type: object properties: value: description: Value of the mileage runtime limit of the contract. type: string example: 12678 unit: description: >- Unit of the mileage runtime limit of the contract according to CL00129. type: string example: km required: - unit total_mileage: description: Contains the total mileage or runtime of the contract. type: object properties: value: description: >- Value of the total mileage or runtime of the contract. This attribute is only relevant for provisional contracts. In case of non-provisional contracts, the total mileage value is calculated with the help of the values of "start_mileage" and "end_mileage". type: string example: 12678 unit: description: >- Unit of the total mileage or runtime of the contract according to CL00129. type: string example: km required: - unit maximum_mileage: description: >- Contains the maximum allowed mileage or fixed mileage of the contract. type: object properties: value: description: >- Value of the maximum allowed mileage or fixed mileage of the contract. In this case the returned processing ID from OEM.IL as a response of this endpoint needs be used to call the endpoint GET /vehicles/tuning-check/process/{processing}. "False" indicates that the callback service by the OEM system KryptoTU should not be triggered. In this case the returned processing ID becomes obsolete and the endpoint GET /vehicles/tuning-check/process/{processing} does not need to be called.
